allow: Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "ALTER TABLE ConceptGroups ADD COLUMN CollapsedRelationships TEXT;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, ParentConceptId, ChildConceptIds, IsCollapsed FROM ConceptGroups ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "UPDATE ConceptGroups SET IsCollapsed = 1 WHERE IsCollapsed = 0;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, ParentConceptId, ChildConceptIds, IsCollapsed FROM ConceptGroups WHERE ParentConceptId IN (227, 229, 230, 228, 231) ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, ParentConceptId, ChildConceptIds, IsCollapsed FROM ConceptGroups WHERE IsCollapsed = 0;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "DELETE FROM ConceptGroups WHERE IsCollapsed = 0;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, ParentConceptId, ChildConceptIds, IsCollapsed FROM ConceptGroups ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT MigrationId FROM __EFMigrationsHistory ORDER BY MigrationId DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT MigrationId FROM __EFMigrationsHistory ORDER BY MigrationId ASC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT MigrationId FROM __EFMigrationsHistory ORDER BY MigrationId DESC LIMIT 3;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, Title, WorkspaceId, IsConceptNote, LinkedConceptId, CreatedAt FROM Notes WHERE Title IN (''Quantum Physics'', ''Philosophy'') ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(sqlite3 /Users/benjaminhoffman/Documents/code/ontology-builder/onto-editor/eidos/ontology.db "SELECT Id, Title, WorkspaceId, IsConceptNote, LinkedConceptId, CreatedAt FROM Notes ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, Name, WorkspaceId FROM Ontologies ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 10;")

Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT w.Id AS WorkspaceId, w.Name AS WorkspaceName, o.Id AS OntologyId, o.Name AS OntologyName FROM Workspaces w LEFT JOIN Ontologies o ON o.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE w.Id = 8;")

Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT w.Id as WorkspaceId, w.Name as WorkspaceName, o.Id as OntologyId, o.Name as OntologyName, o.WorkspaceId as OntologyWorkspaceId FROM Workspaces w LEFT JOIN Ontologies o ON o.WorkspaceId = w.Id ORDER BY w.Id DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, Name, WorkspaceId FROM Ontologies WHERE Name = ''eidos design'' OR Id >= 17 ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 15;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, Name, UserId, CreatedAt FROM Workspaces WHERE Name LIKE ''%eidos design%'' ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "UPDATE Ontologies SET WorkspaceId = 13 WHERE Id = 18; SELECT Id, Name, WorkspaceId FROM Ontologies WHERE Id = 18;")

Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT o.Id as OntId, o.Name as OntName, o.WorkspaceId as OntWsId, w.Id as WsId, w.Name as WsName FROM Ontologies o LEFT JOIN Workspaces w ON w.Name = o.Name WHERE o.Id IN (17, 19) ORDER BY o.Id;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT w.Id, w.Name, o.Id as OntId, o.Name as OntName, o.WorkspaceId FROM Workspaces w LEFT JOIN Ontologies o ON o.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE w.Id = 11;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT Id, Name, WorkspaceId FROM Ontologies WHERE Name LIKE ''%eidos design%'' OR WorkspaceId = 11 ORDER BY Id;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT w.Id, w.Name, o.Id as OntId, o.Name as OntName FROM Workspaces w LEFT JOIN Ontologies o ON o.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE w.Id IN (11, 13) ORDER BY w.Id;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Notes WHERE WorkspaceId = 11;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT WorkspaceId, COUNT(*) as NoteCount FROM Notes WHERE WorkspaceId IN (11, 13) GROUP BY WorkspaceId;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "UPDATE Ontologies SET WorkspaceId = 11 WHERE Id = 18; SELECT Id, Name, WorkspaceId FROM Ontologies WHERE Id = 18;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "DELETE FROM Workspaces WHERE Id = 13; SELECT Id, Name FROM Workspaces WHERE Name = ''eidos design'';")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT w.Id, w.Name, COUNT(n.Id) as NoteCount FROM Workspaces w LEFT JOIN Notes n ON n.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE w.Name = ''eidos design'' GROUP BY w.Id ORDER BY w.Id;")
Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "DELETE FROM Workspaces WHERE Id IN (9, 10, 12); SELECT Id, Name FROM Workspaces WHERE Name = ''eidos design'';")

Bash(sqlite3 ontology.db "SELECT w.Id as WsId, w.Name as WsName, o.Id as OntId, o.Name as OntName, o.WorkspaceId as OntWsId, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Notes n WHERE n.WorkspaceId = w.Id) as NoteCount FROM Workspaces w LEFT JOIN Ontologies o ON o.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE w.Id = 11;")
